sentence.Network_en: A constellation in the Southern Hemisphere near Orion and Columba.
sentence.Network_cn: 天兔(星)座:南半球的一颗星座,位于猎户星座和天鸽星座附近.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 天鸽座(Columba)  由于人类犯下各种各样的罪行,所以上帝决定要惩罚人类,他叫诺亚(Noah)一家人造一只大方舟,让各种动物配对上船。上帝下了40天大雨,将地上所有的.

means.word_mean: 1. a constellation in the southern hemisphere near Puppis and Caelum
2. type genus of the Columbidae: typical pigeons
